title: Bug 118780 - Incorrect display of column names in expression builder
EB: When selecting a dataset and double clicking on the first column name in the expression builder, the expected result is for the alias name (as specified in the data set) to be used. However, the actual result is that the original name of the column is displayed in the expression builder. The alias name appears as 'row["column1"]' above the expression builder after double clicking on the original name.
SR:
1. Open the data set.
2. Set alias for columns in the data set.
3. Open the expression builder.
4. Select the dataset.
5. Double click on the first column name.
6. Check if the alias name is correctly displayed in the expression builder as 'row["column1"]'.
